text: Hi everyone, I’m currently working on a website template where I have to translate static strings. How can I get the translation from the _locales folder in my template .html file ?

Hey everyone, so I’m trying to create a custom template for our blog posts. I have created an HTML + HubL template and put the templateType as blog_post at the top, which does allow me to select this as the template for my blog posts in settings. However, when I go to actually make a blog post, I can’t edit the content anywhere. I can edit the title just fine, and it shows up in the template correctly. But there doesn’t seem to be any way to edit the blog post body itself. Am I missing something in my template to allow this?
Hey Tom- sounds like you just forgot to include the blog content tag so HubSpot knows where to render the blog post content.
